commit.message:
fold-const (fold_unary_loc): New case.

	* fold-const (fold_unary_loc) <NON_LVALUE_EXPR>: New case.
	<CASE_CONVERT>: Pass arg0 instead of op0 to fold_convert_const.

From-SVN: r210518

+	* fold-const (fold_unary_loc) <NON_LVALUE_EXPR>: New case.
+	<CASE_CONVERT>: Pass arg0 instead of op0 to fold_convert_const.
